attributes.action: Urge the Netherlands to withdraw from Holland. The Prime Minister should inform the Dutch to refrain from interfering in Holland and the Netherlands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Netherlands should withdraw from Holland immediately. The Dutch should be concerned with there own affairs and should not interfere with the withdrawal of the Netherlands from Holland.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
